name: Motomancer: Auto Battle
description:
Motomancer: Auto Battle is a motorcycle combat simulator that is built for Twitch!

Inspired by games such as Marbles on Stream and King of the Pit, your Twitch audience takes control of their own 'motomancer', riders of magically imbued motorcycles as they dodge obstacles, take down rivals and talk trash in this gang vs gang skirmish!

--------------------

Streamer Controls:

ESC - Options Menu

Q - Turn Camera Left

E - Turn Camera Right

Audience Controls:

Chat !join or !play to enter.

Chat to make your 'mancer talk trash!

--------------------

Motomancer: Auto Battle is based of MOTOMANCERS, a currently in-development Action game by team Moto. Auto Battle was developed live on stream over 14 days as an experiment.

Team Moto is:

@heyo_sean - Developer, Game Design

@gryphonblade77 - Game Design 

@SoopurKul - Music + SFX

@RavLow - Writing + Game Design
